member.name: F:OrchardCore.DynamicCache.TagHelpers.DynamicCacheTagHelper.DefaultExpiration
member.summary: The default duration, from the time the cache entry was added, when it should be evicted. This default duration will only be used if no other expiration criteria is specified. The default expiration time is a sliding expiration of 30 seconds.
